pred_steps: "The user opens the database application",
"The user navigates to the necessary section for saving changes",
"The user makes necessary changes to the database (e.g., adding, deleting or modifying entries)",
"The user clicks on the 'Save' button to initiate the saving process",
"The system verifies the user's authority to perform the save operation",
"If the user has sufficient authority, the system proceeds with saving the changes to the database",
"The system informs the user whether the saving process was successful or not",
"If successful, the database is updated with the latest changes and the user can close the application or continue working on it",
"If not successful, the system displays an error message and asks the user to retry or provide more information if necessary"
pred_nodes: The database is updated and the user can close or continue working on the application.
